title: Desert snake

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Desert snake can be found south of the orange salamander hunting area in the Kharidian Desert near the Smoke Dungeon entrance. A few may also be found near the Menaphite Thug tent in Pollnivneach. They are just like any other snake, and are non-poisonous. Some players may kill these because they do not hit very high but Waterskins will be needed. They have just two drops: bones, and snake spines which are used during Rag and Bone Man II.

Monster ID3544

A Desert snake can be found south of the orange salamander hunting area in the Kharidian Desert near the Smoke Dungeon entrance. A few may also be found near the Menaphite Thug tent in Pollnivneach. They are just like any other snake, and are non-poisonous. Some players may kill these because they do not hit very high but Waterskins will be needed. They have just two drops: bones, and snake spines which are used during Rag and Bone Man II.
